sect4.title: cmp and diff
sect4.para: cmp and diff both compare two files and report their differences. Both programs have extra options which compare files in different situations.

sect4.title: diff3
sect4.para: The difference between diff and diff3 is that diff compares 2 files, diff3 compares 3 files.

sect4.title: sdiff
sect4.para: sdiff merges two files and interactively outputs the results.
